contexts.context: ...February 17, 1909. Wednesday Each morning very <mark>early</mark> When all is dark and still Earnest goes off...
...March 31, 1909. Wednesday 4.30 AM. "An <mark>early</mark> spring." This is you springing out of bed...
...once again uses a pun. She says "an <mark>early</mark> spring". This both referenceing the person in the...
...the person in the image getting out of bed <mark>early</mark>, and the season of spring coming early.—#...
...bed early, and the season of spring coming <mark>early</mark>.—#lhering
